|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 柔軟体操すると、体を人間みたいな状態に保つことができる。でも気を抜くと、また元に戻る…
|vo_09_02_rm         = Juunan-taisou suru to, karada wo ningen mitai-na joutai ni tamotsu koto ga dekiru. Demo ki wo nuku to, mata moto ni modoru...

|vo_09_03_title      = 七七を知る・3
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 七七を利用しようとする人もいれば、七七を怖がる人もいる。でもあなたは…違う。
|vo_09_03_rm         = Nana wo riyou shiyou to suru hito mo ireba, Nana wo kowagaru hito mo iru. Demo anata wa... chigau.
|vo_09_03_tl         = There are people who will want to use Qiqi, as well as those who are afraid of Qiqi. But you are... different.
|vo_09_04_title      = 七七を知る・4
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 初めて会った時から、あなたから暖かさを感じた。嫌いな熱とは違う、心が温かくなった。ありがとう…嬉しい。今のあなたしか知らないのが残念だ。もし忘れたら…ううん、あなたを覚えるように自分に「命令」するから。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Hajimete atta toki kara, anata kara atatakasa wo kanjita. Kirai-na netsu wa chigau, kokoro ga atatakaku natta. Arigatou... ureshii. Ima no anata shika shiranai no ga zannen da. Moshi wasuretara... uun, anata wo oboeru you ni jibun ni "meirei" suru kara.
|vo_09_04_tl         = When I first met you, I felt your warmth. It wasn't uncomfortably hot, it made my heart warm. Thank you... I'm glad. It's too bad that I've known you only now. If I ever forget... no, I will "order" myself to remember you.
|vo_09_05_title      = 七七を知る・5
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 昔は生きることだけ考えてた、生きる理由も分からなかったけど…今はあなたと生きていきたいと思う。ず、ずっと…一緒にいてくれる？本当に？うん、あなたは七七が守るから！
|vo_09_05_rm         = Mukashi wa ikiteru koto dake kangaeta, ikiru riyuu mo wakaranakatta kedo, ima wa anata to ikite ikitai to omou. Zu, zutto... issho ni ite kureru? Hontou ni? Un, anata wa Nana ga mamoru kara!
|vo_09_05_tl         = Before, I only thought about staying alive and didn't even know what the reason was, but now I want to live along with you. Can... Can you be with me forever? Really? Yes, Qiqi will protect you.
